title: GTBH Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 16 Junior Resident Posts
description: Guru Teg Bahadur Hospital (GTB) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 16Â Junior Resident Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the MBBS can grab this chance and apply for the GTBH Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply online through the website on or before the last date of application...
